                   Element hangingElement,
                   boolean p,
                   DoppelUmlenkrolle d)
Creates a new instance of Umlenkroll Extends the roll class.

Parameters:
w - The width
lose - the lose
s - The scale of width and height
aufzugschacht - the aufzugschacht
ys - The scale of the y-coordinates
p - if roll is part of a double roll
hangingElement - the hanging element
xs - The scale of the x-coordinates
y - The y-coordinates
h - The height
x - The x-coordinates
i - The path of the icon
